transcript:
Customer: Hello.

Customer: Hello.

Executive: Hello. Ji bataiye sir, very good afternoon.

Customer: Very good afternoon. Main H.L. Marble se baat kar raha hu.

Executive: Haan sir?

Customer: IndiaMART mein main dekh raha hu kaafi samay se, sahi se lead toh nahi aa rahi aur kal se toh sirf wash basin hi ki aa rahi hai. Marble wash basin ke alawa na koi fountain, na koi temple, na aur kuch, only wash basin ki lead aa rahi hai bas. Lead kya woh lead.

Executive: Achha only wash basin ki lead aa rahi hai?

Customer: Haan. Bas uske alawa aur kuch aa hi nahi raha. Aisa thodi na hota hai ki agle wale bando ko sirf wash basin hi chahiye hoga. Nahi toh.

Executive: Ji?

Customer: Main keh raha hu aisa thodi na ho sakta hai ki sirf agle wale bando ko wash basin hi chahiye. Uske uske alawa kuch aa hi nahi raha isme.

Executive: Sir, main aapki baat bilkul agree kar rahi hu aapki baat se bilkul agree kar rahi hu. Aap baat kaun kar rahe ho? H.L. Marble Art se baat kar rahe ho na?

Customer: Haan, haan.

Executive: Ek second rukiye. Call hold pe rahega.


Executive: Toh marble wash basin mein toh aap deal karte ho na?

Customer: Deal karta hu but marble mein bhi nahi aa rahi. Woh pata nahi koi marble mein aa rahi hai koi aur dusre material mein aa rahi hai.

Customer: But phir bhi.

Executive: Sir, marble wash basin ki ek valid aapke paas aayi hui hai Maharashtra se GST verified 15 ghante pehle.

Customer: Haan toh main yahi bol raha hu uske alawa bhi toh kuch aana chahiye wash basin ke alawa kuch aa hi nahi raha.

Executive: Woh cheez aapki bilkul theek hai but aapke catalog mein abhi kuch time pehle aath nau din pehle kuch changes hue the. Toh un changes toh humne kar diye the but uske upar cheeze jab apply hoti hai usme thoda sa time lagta hai. Toh thoda sa isme aapko thoda sa aapko patience yaha pe rakhna hoga kyunki kuch cheeze yaha pe change hongi.

Customer: Do hafte ho gaye honge shayad. Maine lead ek hi lead hai bas woh bhi aa rahi hai.

Executive: Aath nau din hue hai is cheez ke liye aapko.

Executive: Toh abhi kya matlab kya aap kya expect kar rahe ho sir?

Customer: Main yahi puch raha tha ki kuch kharabi toh nahi hogi na mere account mein matlab yaar dusre bando ke toh aa rahi hai dusri leads matlab fountain ki.

Executive: Nahi aapki baat bilkul theek hai ki dusre bando ki leads aa rahi hai aapki nahi aa rahi hai aise kuch aise kuch kharabi nahi hai. Usme problem kya aayi hai sir main aapko bata deti hu. Marble wash basin aapka ek product hai white marble aapka ek product hai yaha pe white aap keh rahe ho ki mere ko sirf marble ki bylead mil rahi hai. Yaha pe agar main dekhu white marble ki aapne 30 valid consume ki hai abhi tak. Decorative fountain ki aapne 28 valid consume kari hai marble slabs ki 27 valid consume kari hai.

Customer: Haan, haan, haan. Abhi abhi ki baat kar raha hu main abhi thode din se.

Executive: Kitne din se?

Customer: Pehle toh pehle toh aa rahi thi woh marble temple fountain sab aa rahe the pehle toh lekin ab kal ya parso se main dekh raha hu bas wash basin ke alawa aur kuch nahi aa raha.

Executive: Sir ek do din ke liye regarding aap itne pareshan ho rahe ho. Ek do din toh sir kuch nahi hota.

Customer: Ek do din ki baat nahi hai mujhe pata hai pata hai kab se lead bhi nahi le raha isme kyunki only slabs ki aa rahi hai aur woh bhi kam quantity mein aa rahi hai maine kaha chalo koi nahi theek hai dekhte hai phir dabaati hai. Main continue continue ek ghanta isme data le raha hu samajh lo phir bhi lead aati hai toh kis cheez ki slab.

Executive: Sir ek ghanta bitane ki zarurat nahi hai aapke paas jaise hi notification aayega aap usko use kijiye. Aap tabhi ke tabhi jaake bylead show.

Customer: Is kaam mein notification aane ke baad toh lead haath mein nahi aati.

Customer: Lead haath mein nahi aati itna wait karne mein toh isko secondon mein catch karna padta hai ek ya do second mein.

Executive: Sir competition bhi toh depend karta hai na ab kisi kisi product mein competition.

Customer: Haan haan wahi toh main keh raha hu wahi toh main keh raha hu. Competition se depend.

Executive: Woh cheez aapki theek hai abhi.

Customer: Mere kehne ka matlab hai haan bolo aap.

Executive: Haan aap bataiye mujhe main aap kya matlab kya expect kar rahe ho mujhse?

Customer: Main yeh main yeh chahta hu ki matlab lead toh temple wagera ki fountain ki sabki aani chahiye na.

Executive: Hmm. Toh woh sir aapke catalog mein changes hue hai aap bol rahe ho ki aapko do din se sirf white marble marble wash basin ki aa rahi hai. Do din kuch zyada samay nahi hota hai. Aapke catalog mein toh sab kuch hai usme toh temple bhi hai fountain bhi hai statues bhi hai sab kuch hai.

Executive: Sir lekin do din se hi toh aa rahi hai na yeh cheez aap hi ne abhi mujhe bataiye hai.

Customer: Kya? Usse pehle aap bol rahe ho na ki do din se aa rahi hai sirf mujhe marble wash basin wagera ki bylead.

Customer: Haan aur usse usse pehle bhi toh slabs ki aa rahi thi bas. Matlab aisa kuch aisa kyun? Sab cheez ki aani chahiye na.

Executive: Sir aani chahiye sab cheezon ki lekin ab main kaise aapko yeh cheez explain karu aap bilkul sahi bol rahe ho. Lekin yaha pe kuch catalog mein aapke changes hue hai abhi last aath nau din pehle changes kiye gaye hai. Toh thoda sa aapko iske liye thoda sa patience aapko yaha pe rakhna hoga kyunki sir ekdum se aise nahi hota hai. Kitna patience kitna patience one month toh aapko yaha pe patience rakhna hoga sir. Aur one month bhi tab jab aap daily isko use karoge.

Customer: Daily use use kaise karu phir? Jab lead hi nahi milti mujhe toh main pata continuously baitha rehta hu ek ya do ghante ka isme wait kar raha hu kabhi kabhi toh aa bhi nahi rahi.

Executive: Sir main aapko bata rahi hu. Kabhi kabhi aa rahi hai toh woh bhi phir kabhi kabhi aa rahi hai toh woh dusre material ki aa rahi hai fountain ki aa rahi hai lekin dusre material ki aa rahi hai.

Executive: I agree with you. Main aapki baat se sehmat kar rahi hu.

Executive: Lekin thoda sa yaha pe main dekhti hu ek baar catalog check karke kyunki yaha pe toh aapke catalog mein changes the.

Executive: Sir but main ek baar dobara se recheck kara deti hu. Theek hai. Chaliye theek hai sir. Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not receiving relevant buyleads.

- Only receiving buyleads for wash basins.

- Believes there might be an issue with account.



Resolution:

- Executive stated changes were made to catalog.

- Executive advised to wait and use daily.

- Executive will recheck the catalog.



Next Steps: 

Issue not resolved. Executive will recheck catalog.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, catalog, subscription, patience
